_description: Test investors with tokens BELOW minimum (should all FAIL)
_expected_outcome: All investors should fail token issuance due to minimum token requirements

investors.description: ❌ FAIL - US investor with 2 tokens < 3 minimum (both minUSTokens and minimumHoldingsPerInvestor)
❌ FAIL - EU investor with 2 tokens < 3 minimum (both minEUTokens and minimumHoldingsPerInvestor)
❌ FAIL - JP investor with 2 tokens < 3 minimum (minimumHoldingsPerInvestor only)
